name: Five Ten Sleuth DLX Mid Cycling Shoes - Unisex
description: From jumping gaps to post-ride pub crawls, the Sleuth DLX is ready for it. Rugged leather uppers stand up to the abuse of repeated bails. Stealth® S1 dotty rubber is glue-like fit on your pedals, to help prevent your shins from getting bashed.Easy-care leather upper for durability and street smarts.Mid-height cuff.Inconspicuous reflective material wraps around blinker of shoe for visiblity.Toe protection for on-trail bumps.A mix between a cup and EVA midsole for shock absorption and durability.Flat tread for great grip with pedals.Stealth S1 dotty rubber outsole for unbeatable grip.
